before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"6rd7n","text":"Make sure you have ImageJ downloaded, available here: https://imagej.net/software/fiji/","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":33}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0AA20BDF7E8E48DBA5DF994CFAA3CACD","url":"https://imagej.net/software/fiji/"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"73ukp","text":"This protocol provides a quick way to quantify change in area of an object in a large series of images, by pixel contrast. It's equivalent to rootpainter, except much simpler, but it does rely on good contrast of light and dark in the region you wish to measure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4llsb","text":"Others have used ImageJ for this too, but the method and workflow we provide has been tested successfully by many students and therefore offers a more consistent, standardized process.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"elggg","text":"Create a workflow (macro) in ImageJ with the following steps: This will be run on all your images.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"433c5","text":"Open ImageJ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"lh78","text":"Opening an image, ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mn69","text":"Selecting Plugin\u003eMacro\u003eRecord, which opens up a ‘recorder’ window.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9opo8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7e7ol","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9mq23","text":"Once you have the recorder window open it will automatically record your actions from this point onward","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2qcc","text":"Recording the macro for image processing: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"806nj","text":"Set image type to 8-bit grayscale","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5acd8","text":"Select the rectangular selection tool and draw a rectangle over
the image to create a ROI,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6a6sm","text":"Crop the image to that region >Image>Crop, ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfvnk","text":"Threshold the image >Image>Adjust>Threshold>Auto>Set>OK, ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mtum","text":"Measure the area fraction, >Analyze>Set Measurements>, check the
Area Fraction box (no other measure is needed), >Analyze>Measure. This action sends the measurement to a results window. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5voq","text":"Save the results to a folder by choosing >File>Save as>[choose your folder and type the file name].","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17qje","text":"Stop the macro recording in the ‘recorder’ window by clicking >Create. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eom1f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25c8","text":"A Macro.ijm window opens with the macro, click >File>Save as>[choose a
folder and file name for the macro].","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ecdm2","text":"Close the image and result window now.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fk65k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dklpk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"125li","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4oeeg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b0674","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"afp8a","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c2bkt","text":"The default is to measure the dark areas of the image (coloured in red by ImageJ). To measure the light areas instead check the "dark background" box on the threshold window.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"619AEC0DC78711EE90910A58A9FEAC02","height":219,"id":470919,"is_video":false,"legend":"{"blocks":[{"key":"es6d9","text":"Example of ImageJ thresholding based on pixel brightness/contrast on a selected cropped region","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"imagej threshold.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qm6jb9h6x.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qm6hb9h6x.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qm6ib9h6x.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qm6gb9h6x.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"biqve","text":"Run the macro on a set of images: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60kqg","text":"In the main ImageJ toolbar choose >Process>Batch>Macro, to open the batch process window.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1m874","text":"Select the folder which contains the image set to be analysed, and the folder
where the data and the processed images will be placed. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cj9r5","text":"Copy and paste the macro.ijm file from above into the window, and click >Process. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fbdm3","text":"
The image set will be analysed and the area fraction for each image will be calculated and placed in
a .csv file, which can be opened for graphing or further analysis in Excel or other programs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d39fp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9s8cj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"24j2r","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A587E7D8C77911EEB7180A58A9FEAC02","height":267,"id":470923,"is_video":false,"legend":"{"blocks":[{"key":"acngg","text":"Summarized workflow analyzing a selected area of the excurrent canal system in Ephydatia muelleri. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":79,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"ImageJ analysis.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qm6pb9h6x.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qm6mb9h6x.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qm6nb9h6x.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qm6kb9h6x.webp","width":550}}}}
